definition: to sense/perception/to feel (through the senses)/to experience/a feeling/an impression/an experience
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
sensory receptor

sentences.english: Would my take you hand, would you understand Just how I feel?
sentences.chinese: 我能牵起你的手感受我的内心吗？

sentences.english: Twelve months' non-stop football is doing me well. I feel that I am still growing in form.
sentences.chinese: 这是我这几年来第一次有这样的感受。

sentences.english: Feel how you are coming into s state of Balance with the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 感受你现在进入到一种与地球完全合一的全然状态。

sentences.english: So dear friends , let's open our hearts and ears to enjoy music .
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的朋友，让我们敞开心灵和张开双耳去感受音乐。

sentences.english: Love them enough to allow them to experience the consequences of their actions.
sentences.chinese: 爱他们足以让他们感受到自己的行为产生的后果。

sentences.english: Your new driving experience comes from the newly-designed car.
sentences.chinese: 新汽车给您一种新的驾驶感受。

sentences.english: Can they feel the  crackle of  electricity in the wind?
sentences.chinese: 他们能否感受到风中的电光火石？

sentences.english: I feel intimately inside myself where the role belongs.
sentences.chinese: 我能丝丝入扣地在自我当中感受角色之所在。

sentences.english: Friends worldwide are welcome to know more Tiens and experience Tiens products.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎更多海内外朋友了解和感受天狮产品。

sentences.english: the pervading emotion is, I'd say, just stress and hurriedness.
sentences.chinese: 这里的人们最普遍的感受还是压力以及慌忙感。

sentences.english: To Marc Chagall, the marriage with Bella Rosenfeld, his life, bears the best witness to love and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 与妻子蓓拉的婚姻，是夏卡尔感受爱与美最好的见证。

sentences.english: I have a complex feeling while seeing He's works.
sentences.chinese: 看何唯娜的作品，就有这种复杂的感受。

sentences.english: Its impact has been felt even in small villages in India and Africa.
sentences.chinese: 它的影响甚至连印度和非洲的小村庄里都已经感受到。

sentences.english: Can you feel the spring in the air?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有感受到春天的气息？

sentences.english: QUEENIE: Everybody feels different about themselves one way or another.
sentences.chinese: 每个人对于自己的感受都不一样。

sentences.english: Most viewers can empathize with the sense of hesitation and uncertainty embodied in such an image.
sentences.chinese: 大多数读者都能感受到这幅画中包含的犹豫和彷徨。

definition: to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
to experience for oneself
body odor/to appreciate a subtle taste
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
to have a taste of/to realize/to appreciate
to give to/to provide to/to bring to/to take to
to appreciate/to enjoy/to admire
one's thoughts and feelings/emotional stirring/moved/touched
(idiom) to experience it for oneself/to actually *be* there (as opposed to reading about it etc)
direct/concerning oneself/personal
to feel/to sense/to detect/to perceive/to become aware
to come to realize/to appreciate (feelings)
charm/fascination/glamor/charisma
to sample/to taste/to appreciate/one's taste (i.e. in music, literature, fashion, food and drink etc)/good taste
delight/pleasure/joy
joyful/cheerful/delighted/joy/delight
